byline.original: By BEN HUBBARD and HWAIDA SAAD
byline.contributor: Ben Hubbard reported from Riyadh, and Hwaida Saad from Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: The pilot was captured after he parachuted to the ground, though exactly how the plane was brought down was unclear.

headline.main: Rebels in Syria Shoot Down Government Fighter Jet

snippet: The pilot was captured after he parachuted to the ground, though exactly how the plane was brought down was unclear.
